# UIWindowScene.PresentationStyle.standard

**Case**

The default style of the system.

## Declaration

```swift
case standard
```

## Discussion

On iPad, the system displays the window scene in Split View, side-by-side with the scene that originated the request for the new scene.

## Constants

- **UIWindowScene.PresentationStyle.automatic**: The system determines the most appropriate style.
- **UIWindowScene.PresentationStyle.prominent**: Presents prominently above others in the current space.
